titles.title: Authorizing the use of the Capitol Grounds for an event to commemorate the 20th Anniversary of the Million Man March.
Authorizing the use of the Capitol Grounds for an event to commemorate the 20th Anniversary of the Million Man March.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Mr. Crawford asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Permits the Million Man March, Inc. 2015 to sponsor a free public event on the Capitol grounds on October 10, 2015, to commemorate the 20th Anniversary of the Million Man March.
